issue.title: optional::value_type is not always a value type

discussion.p: optional<T>::value_type is T, which can be a cv-qualified object type. This is inconsistent with the uses of the name value_type elsewhere in the standard. We should either require optional<T>::value_type to be remove_cv_t<T> — a true value type — or rename the type alias to element_type.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.
